entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
